```{r}
# Load required library
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

# Read the file (change filename if in a different directory)
data <- read_csv("IMPC_parameter_description.txt", show_col_types = FALSE)

# Remove duplicate rows
data_clean <- distinct(data)

# Remove duplicates based on the 'parameterId' column, keeping the first occurrence
data_clean <- data_clean %>%
  distinct(parameterId, .keep_all = TRUE)

# Optionally, write the cleaned data to a new file
write_csv(data_clean, "IMPC_parameter_description_cleaned.csv")

```
